resources.string:
"The data on your phone is no longer accessible for unknown reason.
To resume using your phone, you must perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you will have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google account. "

"This will reset all of your phone's settings, including: "
Phone system settings" "
Bundled application settings" It will not erase: "
User specified settings" "
Installed applications" "
SD card files, such as music or photos
Master reset cancelled. Airplane mode mode not on.
"Clear all data on the phone's internal mass storage, such as music and photos."
You must draw your unlock pattern to confirm that you want to erase the internal storage.
Disable foreground and background data on mobile data network only. Wi-Fi network will be used if available.
To restrict foreground and background data for this app, set mobile data limit first.

"This feature may cause an app that depends on data traffic to stop working when Wi-Fi network is not available.
Tap View app settings to control data usage for this app specifically."
"Restricting foreground and background data is only possible when you've set a mobile data limit."
To check SMS counter settings, turn on SMS counter.
Turn off airplane mode to activate SMS counter
Warning level must be less than maximum limitation
Maximum limitation must be more than warning level
The specified message maximum limitation reached. Additional charge may apply.
Message warning level reached. Tap to view SMS counter settings.
Message maximum limitation reached. Tap to view SMS counter settings.

When tethering is enabled, all packet transmission is regarded as communications made by connecting to a PC or other external device.In this case, Packet communication charges may apply even when external devices are not connected. To avoid additional costs, disabling tethering is strongly recommended when finished.
Any ongoing operations such as media transfer, phone software update, backup and restore will be interrupted.

"This will erase all data from your phone's "internal storage", including:
"
Your account" "
System and app data and settings" "
Downloaded apps
Set how long device will be discoverable for
"Prevent use of the Bluetooth dialler when the screen is locked "
Do you want to connect to \"%1$s\"?
Manage WiFi, Bluetooth, aeroplane mode, mobile networks & VPNs
Set date, time, time zone & formats
Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your phone each time you power it on

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media and other files. Once you encrypt your phone, you must enter a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on: you can't unencrypt your phone except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.
Encryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your phone plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data."
You must set a lock screen PIN or password before you can start encryption.
"Encrypt phone? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the phone will restart several times. "
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.

"Encryption was interrupted and can't complete. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible.
To resume using your phone, you must perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you'll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account. "
Change or disable pattern, PIN or password security
Disabled by administrator, encryption policy or credential storage

"When this feature is turned on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam Browser pages, YouTube videos, People contacts and more.
Just bring the devices together (typically back to back) and then touch your screen. The app determines what gets beamed."
"Don't use a WiFi network unless it has a good Internet connection"
To see available networks, turn on WiFi.
The network was avoided due to poor connection. Turn off this behaviour from the Settings > WiFi screen, Advanced menu item.
Another WiFi protected session was detected. Try again in a few minutes.
"Lets you transfer photos using camera software and transfer any files on computers that don't support MTP"

"
To clear music, pictures and other user data, the "internal storage needs to be erased.
Let apps use data from sources such as WiFi and mobile networks to determine your approximate location

"Protect your phone from unauthorised use by creating a personal screen unlock pattern. Slide your finger to connect at least four dots in any order on the next screen.
Ready to start? Touch Next. "

Your phone and personal data are more vulnerable to attack by apps from unknown sources. You agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your phone or loss of data that may result from using these apps.
This app may not be designed for your screen. You can control how it adjusts to your screen here.
"The app wasn't found in the list of installed apps."
If you disable a built-in app, other apps may misbehave.
This service was started by its app. Stopping it may cause the app to fail.
"This app can't safely be stopped. If you stop it, you may lose some of your current work."
"This is an old app process that is still running in case it's needed again. There is usually no reason to stop it."
%1$s: currently in use. Touch Settings to control it.
If you stop this service, some features of your phone may stop working correctly until you power it off and then on again.
Press Space key twice to insert \".\"
This input method may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the app %1$s. Use this input method?
This spell checker may be able to collect all the text you type, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the app %1$s. Use this spell checker?

"When Explore by Touch is turned on, you can hear or see descriptions of what's under your finger.
This feature is for low-vision users."
%1$s can collect all of the text you type, except passwords. This includes personal data such as credit card numbers. It can also collect data about your interactions with the phone.
TalkBack provides spoken feedback to help blind users and those with poor eyesight. Do you want to install it for free from Android Market?
Do you want apps to install scripts from Google that make their web content more accessible?
This feature changes the way your device responds to touch. Turn on?
"Turn off WiFi when not using it or when it isn't available"

This speech synthesis engine may be able to collect all the text that will be spoken, including personal data such as passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the %s engine. Enable the use of this speech synthesis engine?
Please enter the correct password. Number of attempts left before the credential storage is erased: %1$d
Back up app data, WiFi passwords and other settings to Google servers
No account is currently storing backed-up data
When reinstalling an app, restore backed-up settings and data
Stop backing up your WiFi passwords, bookmarks, other settings and app data, and erase all copies on Google servers?
Activating this administrator will allow the app %1$s to perform the following operations:
This administrator is active and allows the app %1$s to perform the following operations:
"You can't configure an EAP WiFi connection during setup. After setup, you can do that in Settings > Wireless & networks."
Connecting can take a few minutes…

Touch Next" to continue with setup.
Touch "Back to connect to a different WiFi network.
Welcome to Google sync!" A Google approach to synchronising data to allow access to your contacts, appointments and more from wherever you are."
Removing this account will delete all of its messages, contacts and other data from the phone!
Flash screen when apps do long operations on main thread
Destroy every activity as soon as the user leaves it
Show App Not Responding dialogue for background apps
Disable background data on mobile data network only. WiFi will be used if available.

"This feature may cause an app that depends on background data to stop working when WiFi isn't available.
You can find more appropriate data usage controls in the settings available within the app."
"If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to a WiFi network."
Good. Keep sliding your fingers up to scroll a bit more.
